title: The Story of Henry Handel Richardson
brief_description: This animated short was highly commended in the “Create a Stamp Story” section of the Screen It! competition. Henry Handel Richardson was the pseudonym of Ethel Florence Lyndsey Richardson; this stamp story is about her achievements in music and literature. An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
